banner.headline: I develop web and mobile applications.
banner.description: I am a software developer who has worked with clients ranging from startups to small businesses, on applications ranging from energy renovation to virtual second-hand clothing platforms.

aboutme.headline: About
aboutme.first_paragraph: After exploring the field of digital, growth, and automation for 3 years by supporting startups, I decided to dive into web development by joining Le Wagon in the summer of 2021.
aboutme.second_paragraph: I joined a web & mobile development agency where I work on various projects using Ruby On Rails and Vue.js/Ionic.
aboutme.third_paragraph: Here are the technologies I have worked with recently

lewagon.title: Web Development Bootcamp
lewagon.details: Intensive training in Ruby on Rails, SQL, JS, and building a web project

second_ebi.title: Biotech & Entrepreneurship Engineering
second_ebi.details: Project launch & competitions, Innovation, Marketing (Digital, B2B)

captive.name: Captive
missions: For Effy (2 energy renovation web applications), contributed to reducing technical debt and solving complex bugs: Application maintenance and version upgrades: Rails 5, 6, 7, Ruby 3, Sidekiq 7.

For Vera (Virtual wardrobe mobile app), improved multi-platform SSO (Account/User separation), created the outfit suggestion algorithm and improved SQL performance, integrated fullstack features: Rest API, Vue.js/Ionic integration (Outfit likes, follows), created tests (Rspec, Cypress, Jest).

Other projects: Backend features using TDD (unit and integration tests), SQL and API performance optimization, rights management & admin features, added soft-delete on key models, updated and maintained technical documentation.

freelance.name: Freelancing
missions: For Mister Auto: Led between the IT department and business teams for the implementation of the existing transactional system to Emarsys (SAP). Defined and implemented the design system, created a hundred HTML/CSS components with business logic.

For Goodwill: Designed an API enrichment engine (via 4 API endpoints) to enrich 13k accounting firms to obtain the contact details of their executives. Cleaned and segmented contacts, created automation for LinkedIn prospecting, email follow-ups (Ruby On Rails, Rest API, script, Google Sheets).
Various Growth missions: Set up outbound prospecting systems, SEO strategy, SEO audits, prospecting training, website setup, etc.

lewagon.name: Le Wagon
missions: Over 50 days of support for Le Wagon students and workshops (X-HEC).
Resolved tickets and explained concepts on the following topics: Ruby Algorithms, OOP, SQL, Front-end (HTML/CSS/JS), Ruby On Rails, Heroku, Git, Github.

cartelis.name: Cartelis
missions: Consulting mission: Operational lead for the implementation of a B2B prospecting system: targeting various customer segments, building targeted prospect databases, automated multi-channel contact (email, LinkedIn), and setting up performance tracking: CPL: 15.
Developed Google Sheet resources: Automated Firebase tagging plan, digital project planning, marketing action plan.
Wrote articles on data/digital topics (tool comparisons, lead scoring, prospecting, etc.).

vera.title: Vera
vera.description: Mobile app for iOS and Android: Virtual wardrobe with a social dimension similar to Instagram (Account, Like, Follow, Share, Profile)
features: Improved multi-platform SSO (Account/User separation)
Created the outfit suggestion algorithm (SQL performance optimization)
Integrated fullstack features: Rest API, Vue.js/Ionic integration (Outfit likes, follows, outfits)
Created tests (Rspec, Cypress, Jest)
vera.technologies: Ruby On Rails, Vue.js, Ionic, GCP

quelleenergie.title: Quelleenergie
quelleenergie.description: Quelleenergie is a Back-office/ERP platform for French artisans involving geolocation, matchmaking, billing, etc.
features: SQL query optimization on PostgreSQL and MySQL (geolocation/matching, data exports)
Revamped server logs and API documentation for tech teams
Data migrations with significant business impacts (hundreds of thousands of entries)
Added fullstack features

annuaire.title: Annuaire
annuaire.description: Ruby on Rails application for daily updates of 300k+ French artisans, their companies, certifications (https://artisans.quelleenergie.fr/)
features: Reduced technical debt (Table size reduction, API documentation overhaul, etc.)
Proactive bug monitoring (Datadog, GCP) and correction of complex bugs (APIs, tool synchronization, CRON & Jobs)
Added back-end and admin features
Application maintenance and version upgrades: Rails 5.2 to 7, Ruby 3
Data migrations with significant business impacts (hundreds of thousands of entries)

misterauto.title: Mister Auto
misterauto.description: Consultant for migrating the existing transactional system to Emarsys (SAP)
features: Coordinated business rules between IT and business teams to handle country/product-specificities, etc.
Wrote technical documentation and provided training for 15 people to make teams autonomous
Result: 99.7% deliverability for over 150k emails/month (Integration of 45 emails in 19 languages)

goodwill.title: Goodwill
goodwill.description: Goodwill is a digital service company for accounting firms
features: Designed an API enrichment engine (Via 4 API endpoints) to enrich 13k accounting firms and obtain the contact details of their executives
Cleaned and segmented contacts
Created automation for LinkedIn prospecting and email follow-ups (Ruby On Rails, Rest API, script, Google Sheets)
goodwill.technologies: Ruby On Rails, Sidekiq, Third-party APIs

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A simple portfolio showcasing my journey and projects
features: Translation using vue-i18n to define all site content, auto translation button
Implemented responsive design for mobile

script.title: Scraping Script
features: Script for retrieving and enriching ETF data from Boursorama
Script for retrieving cryptocurrency data

footer.first_text: Made in Paris in 2024 by Tristan Monteiro
